query.q: R::`view`:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(percentile(`loading_time`,75)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(count(view_id) as PV) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(percentile(`loading_time`,75) as `P75(加载耗时)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

links.alias: 跳转到 View 查看器

query.q: R::view:(count(view_id) as `PV`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by view_loading_type

R::view:(percentile(`largest_contentful_paint`,75) as `P75(LCP)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(percentile(`first_input_delay`,75) as `P75(FID)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(percentile(`cumulative_layout_shift`,75) as `P75(CLS)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(count(session_id) as `会话数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by view_path_group

R::view:(percentile(`loading_time`,75) as `P75(加载时间)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by view_path_group

R::view:(percentile(`largest_contentful_paint`,75) as `P75(LCP)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by view_path_group

R::view:(percentile(`first_input_delay`,75) as `P75(FID)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by view_path_group

R::view:(percentile(`cumulative_layout_shift`,75) as `P75(CLS)`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_loading_type` = '#{view_loading_type}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by view_path_group

links.alias: 跳转到 [Long task 查看器]

settings.titleDesc: 当前时间范围内，发生过长任务的 PV 数量占总 PV  数量的比率。

charts.name: 发生长任务的页面占比

children.q: R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_long_task_count` > 0 and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

query.q: eval(A/B, alias='长任务机率', A="R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `view_long_task_count` > 0 and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}", B="R::view:(count(view_id)) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}")

R::long_task:(percentile(`duration`,75) as `耗时`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'}

settings.titleDesc: 当前时间段内不同按键的操作次数及发生长任务次数。（此处长任务判断逻辑：操作执行时间超过 50 ms ，则视为该次操作发生了长任务）

query.q: R::action:(count(action_name) as `操作次数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by action_name

R::action:(count(duration) as `长任务发生次数`) {`app_id` = '#{appid}' and `env` = '#{env}' and `version` = '#{version}' and `country` = '#{country}' and `browser` = '#{browser}' and `view_path_group` = '#{view_path_group}' and `duration` > 50000000 and 'sdk_name' = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by action_name

R::resource:(count(resource_type)) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and resource_type in ['xhr','fetch'] and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_type

R::resource:(count(resource_type) as `资源数`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and resource_type in ['xhr','fetch'] and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_type

R::resource:(percentile(`duration`,75) as `加载时间`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and resource_type in ['xhr','fetch'] and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_type

R::`resource`:(count(resource_url_path_group) as `资源数`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and resource_type in ['xhr','fetch'] and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

R::`resource`:(percentile(`duration`,50) as `P50(加载耗时)`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and resource_type in ['xhr','fetch'] and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

R::`resource`:(percentile(`resource_size`,50) as `P50(资源大小)`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and resource_type in ['xhr','fetch'] and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(count(resource_type)) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_type

R::resource:(count(resource_url_host) as `资源数`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_host

R::resource:(percentile(`resource_size`,50) as `P50(资源大小)`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_host

R::resource:(last(resource_url_host) as `域名`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(count(resource_url) as `资源数`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(percentile(`duration`,50) as `P50(加载时间)`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

R::resource:(percentile(`resource_size`,50) as `P50(资源大小)`) {app_id = '#{appid}' and env = '#{env}' and version = '#{version}' and country = '#{country}' and browser = '#{browser}' and view_path_group = '#{view_path_group}' and sdk_name = 'df_web_rum_sdk'} by resource_url_path_group

title: Web 应用页面性能分析
